name: preact-render-to-string
description: Render JSX to an HTML string, with support for Preact components.

scripts.build: npm run -s transpile && npm run -s transpile:jsx && npm run -s transpile:stream && npm run -s copy-typescript-definition
scripts.transpile: echo 'export const ENABLE_PRETTY = false;'>env.js && microbundle src/index.js -f es,umd --target web --external preact
scripts.transpile:jsx: echo 'export const ENABLE_PRETTY = true;'>env.js && microbundle src/jsx.js -o dist/jsx.js --target web --external none && microbundle dist/jsx.js -o dist/jsx.js -f cjs
scripts.transpile:stream: echo 'export const ENABLE_PRETTY = true;'>env.js && microbundle dist/stream.js --external preact,stream -o dist/stream.js -f cjs
scripts.copy-typescript-definition: copyfiles -f src/index.d.ts dist && copyfiles -f src/stream.d.ts dist
scripts.test: eslint src test && mocha --compilers js:@babel/register test/**/*.js
scripts.release: npm run build && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Jason Miller <jason@developit.ca>
